list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an individual or collaborative enterprise that is carefully planned to achieve a particular aim.
estimate or forecast (something) on the basis of present trends or data.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chi tiêu đã được dự kiến ở mức 72 triệu đô la

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: extend outward beyond something else; protrude.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I noticed a slip of paper projecting from the book
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi nhận thấy một tờ giấy dự bị từ cuốn sách

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: throw or cause to move forward or outward.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: seeds are projected from the tree
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hạt giống được chiếu từ cây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: present or promote (a particular view or image).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he strives to project an image of youth
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh phấn đấu để chiếu một hình ảnh của tuổi trẻ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: draw straight lines from a center of or parallel lines through every point of (a given figure) to produce a corresponding figure on a surface or a line by intersecting the surface.
make a projection of (the earth, sky, etc.) on a plane surface.
